content.html: Remy took his No More 404 idea and turned it into a hosted service, unrot, and it’s really neat. Setting it up was a piece of cake, as was modifying things to proxy all communication through my site.

content.html:
The reality, today in fact, is that with the service worker capability we can deliver the same offline experience as many appstore installed mobile apps.
https://remysharp.com/2020/07/17/works-offline >

content.html:
Send Outgoing Webmentions

In a recent Twitch session I decided to add Webmentions to my blog, specifically in the flavour of showing “liked” from other websites (though, who am I kidding, it’ll just be Twitter…).
Amazingly I managed it in 90 minutes (with 3 stream crashes to boot).
Adding Webmentions to a site seemed strai…
